template.title: Apply for Health Care
template.description: Apply for VA health care benefits. Find out which documents you’ll need, and start your online application today.
template.maintenance_line1: We’re sorry. The health care application is currently down while we fix a few things. We’ll be back up as soon as we can.
template.maintenance_line2: In the meantime, you can call 1-877-222-VETS (1-877-222-8387), Monday – Friday, 8:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m. (ET) and press 2 to complete this application over the phone.
